title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works 2
synopsis: Another installment in the Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann Parallel Works anthology series of animated shorts, featuring characters from Gurren Lagann in alternative worlds. Every clip is animated by a particular animator of GAINAX.
related_anime: ['Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works', 'Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann']
characters: ['Simon', 'Teppelin, Nia', 'Bachika, Kittan', 'Adai, Rossiu', 'Adai, Darry', 'Adai, Gimmy', 'Kamina', 'Littner, Yoko', 'Viral', 'Lordgenome']
